header.footerDescription: With 20+ years in Egypt’s real estate market, ARX delivers exceptional services.

about.title: About Us
about.description: REDEFINING LUXURY REAL ESTATE WITH 20+ YEARS OF EXCELLENCE.
about.vision_description: To be a leading urban development company with far-reaching and sustainable horizons that reflect the vision and ambition of the general company from the heart of the world to the entire world.
about.mission_description: We deliver high-quality, culturally unique real estate projects that align with global standards, meeting the needs of clients and partners. Guided by strong values, we support sustainable urban development through thoughtful planning and execution.
about.values_description: Arx Real Estate Development is committed to upholding key values, including quality, integrity, and customer satisfaction. By prioritizing initiative, self-development, and accountability, we ensure that our projects meet global standards while delivering exceptional results and fostering long-term relationships with our clients and partners.
about.ahmed_describe: Chairman of ARX Real Estate Development With a visionary mindset and decades of expertise, Dr. Ahmed Omar leads ARX Development toward redefining excellence in real estate, setting benchmarks for innovation, quality, and trust.
about.yasser_describe: CEO of ARX Real Estate Development leads the company with a forward-thinking vision, delivering innovative and high-quality projects aligned with market needs and sustainable growth.
about.saad_describe: board member of ARX Real Estate Development brings a forward-thinking vision to reshape the real estate sector. With his vast experience, he drives the company toward innovation and sustainability, ensuring ARX’s projects meet the highest global standards
about.osama_describe: board member of ARX Real Estate Development With strategic vision and inspiring leadership, Dr. Osama Omar is reshaping the real estate development landscape, setting new standards of excellence and driving ARX toward a future of greater innovation, sustainability, and continued success.

shorts.title: Our Shorts
shorts.description: A glimpse into our journey, one reel at a time.
